{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.16730v1", "title": "Extremal divisors on moduli spaces of K3 surfaces", "summary": "We establish numerical criteria for when a Noether-Lefschetz divisor on a
moduli space of quasi-polarized K3 surfaces $F_{2d}$, or more generally on an
orthogonal modular variety, generates an extremal ray in the cone of
pseudoeffective divisors. In particular, for all d, we exhibit many extremal
rays of the cone of pseudoeffective divisors of both $F_{2d}$ and any normal
projective $\mathbb{Q}$-factorial compactification of $F_{2d}$ lying over its
Baily-Borel compactification.", "main_category": "math.AG", "categories": "math.AG,math.NT", "published": "2025-04-23T14:01:41Z"}
